mapper.select: select camera_id as cameraId, camera_code as cameraCode, t_site.site_id as siteId, site_name as siteName, lng, lat, t_camera.region_id as regionId, region_name as regionName from t_camera, t_site, t_region where t_camera.site_id = t_site.site_id and t_camera.region_id = t_region.id and t_camera.camera_id = #{cameraId}
